summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the floating chatbot widget. All chatbot features working correctly: button visibility, open/close toggle, chat window UI, quick questions, message input/send, bot responses, and multi-page visibility.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts pointer events on chatbot button - requires force=True or JS click to interact
ui_bugs.note: This is a known Emergent preview environment issue, not a code bug

passed_tests: Chatbot button visible in bottom-right corner (x: 1840, y: 1000)
Chatbot button has correct dimensions (56x56px)
Chat window opens on button click
Chat window header 'SITERANK Assistant' visible
Initial bot greeting message visible
Chat input field visible and functional
Send button visible and functional
Quick question 'How do I get started?' visible
Quick question 'What does Optimize do?' visible
Quick question 'How to analyze SEO?' visible
Quick question click sends message and receives bot response
Manual message input works
Send button click sends message
Enter key sends message
Bot provides relevant responses (SEO, features, getting started)
Chat window closes on button click (toggle)
Chat window reopens on button click (toggle)
Conversation history preserved after close/reopen
Chatbot visible on Landing page (/)
Chatbot visible on SEO Features page (/features/seo)
Chatbot visible on Support page (/support)
Chatbot visible on Blog page (/blog)
critical_code_review_comments: ChatBot.js properly uses data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Client-side keyword matching (getBotResponse) provides relevant responses
Quick questions disappear after 2+ messages as designed
Chat window has proper z-index (z-50) for floating behavior
test_credentials: None required - chatbot accessible without login
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chatbot widget fully functional. Uses client-side keyword matching for responses (no backend API). Key test IDs: chat-bot-btn, chat-bot-window, chat-input, chat-send-btn. Note: In Emergent preview environment, the 'Made with Emergent' badge may intercept clicks - use JavaScript click or force=True in Playwright.

chatbot_button.styling: emerald-to-cyan gradient when closed, gray when open
